name: @clawdbot/timbot
description: Clawdbot Tencent Cloud IM intelligent bot channel plugin
author: longyuqi@tencent.com

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/src/debug && cp src/debug/GenerateTestUserSig-es.js src/debug/lib-generate-test-usersig-es.min.js dist/src/debug/

channel.label: Tencent IM
channel.blurb: Tencent Cloud IM bot via webhooks + REST API.
